name: mcp-cursor-server
description: MCP (Model Context Protocol) server for Xcode, Android Studio integration with Cursor Editor and multiple AI models

scripts.git:push: npm run version:patch && git add . && git commit -m "v$(npm run version:show --silent): $(git log -1 --pretty=%B | head -1)" && git push origin main
scripts.git:push:minor: npm run version:minor && git add . && git commit -m "v$(npm run version:show --silent): $(git log -1 --pretty=%B | head -1)" && git push origin main
scripts.git:push:major: npm run version:major && git add . && git commit -m "v$(npm run version:show --silent): $(git log -1 --pretty=%B | head -1)" && git push origin main
scripts.release: npm run version:changelog && npm run git:push
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:changelog && npm run git:push:minor
scripts.release:major: npm run version:changelog && npm run git:push:major

author: kakaovx
